name: Buster's Journey
description:
Are you sure that you're greedy enough to play this game?

Use typical WASD buttons and SPACE to move around (standard controller input is also supported) and collect all the crystals, find out what happens when you do and become self aware :)

A game submission for extra credit's fan jam, themed AWARE.

Development (Unity) : The Llama Concept (a.k.a. Nizitowns, Purul3nt)

Art: Unity Asset Store

http://thellamaconcept.com

https://itch.io/profile/nizitowns
